allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add report sub-pages and API routes

- Add defects management page with three-part structure \(Observation/Analysis/Opinion\)
- Add photos management page with EXIF metadata display
- Add roof elements documentation page with condition ratings
- Add PDF generation page
- Add settings/profile page
- Add API routes for elements, photos, and user profile
- Add local file storage fallback for development \(no R2 required\)
- Make photo processing more resilient with fallbacks
- Update schema with company and address fields for users

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
